summary: REQ-8 and the scroll-based throttled loader UI (REQ-9/REQ-11) appear implemented in the modified public header and homepage categories section. However, the mobile-only banner height reduction (REQ-12) is not evidenced in the provided index.css diff, and the category pagination/append semantics required by REQ-10 cannot be confirmed from the diff summary (hook logic not shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Each scroll trigger loads and appends exactly 5 additional categories without replacing/resetting existing ones; preserve backend ordering; track total/hasMore correctly; avoid duplicates.
missing_requirements.reason: The component passes a pageSize of 5 into the hook, but the diff does not show the hook implementation or any explicit logic proving that each trigger appends exactly 5 additional categories, maintains ordering by the order field, prevents duplicates, and correctly computes hasMore/total.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reduce the home page banner height by 20% on mobile screens only via responsive CSS media queries appended below the existing :root block in frontend/src/index.css (do not modify the :root block); desktop banner unchanged.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the :root block and other CSS, but does not show any appended media-query CSS that adjusts the .store-banner (or banner) height on mobile; StoreBanner was changed to use className="store-banner" but no corresponding CSS change is evidenced.
